scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run dev" "cd server && python manage.py runserver 5000"
scripts.build: cd client && npm start && cd .. && cd server && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
scripts.server: cd server && pip freeze > requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput
